sentence.Network_en: Mushroom coral ( Fungia scutaria ) is formed from a single polyp, instead of a colony of polyps.
sentence.Network_cn: 蘑菇珊瑚的形成来自一个单一的珊瑚虫, 代替一群珊瑚虫.

baesInfo.translate_result: fungi(fungus的复数)真菌（如蘑菇和霉，霉，霉菌
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
